title: The Year of the Rams
description: A feast for all country lovers. When Elizabeth Arthursson acquired two small ewe lambs she had never realised how intelligent, lovable and affectionate sheep could be. Now she tells how Rupert, Adam, Portia, Tallulah, Barnaby, Fabian and Ram Friday came to join the little flock in the meadow behind the Tudor cottage where she lived.
author: Elizabeth Arthursson
